Title: Day 5: 6:00 P.M. - 7:00 P.M.
Plot:
Jack takes Henderson to CTU for questioning. Once there, he faces an unhappy reunion with his daughter, Kim. 

Mike appeals to Martha for help as Logan faces pressure from his Vice-President to declare martial law on L.A. 

Lynn connects the theft of his keycard to an impending strike on CTU, but his warning comes too late to stop a terrorist from infiltrating the building.
GuestStars: Alex Kuznetsov,  Danielle Burgio,  C. Thomas Howell,  Dan Warner,  Elisha Cuthbert
